current_contact.agency: San Bernardino County Sheriff Department - Coroner Division

case_body_condition: Not recognizable - Partial remains with soft tissues
case_address_found_1: Found in mountain creek 4 miles north of town
case_circumstances: Skeletal remains of a male adult, designated John Doe #49-91, found in mountain creek area north of town.  Identity can only be established by dental X-ray comparison or DNA.  This person had a "Classic  ZMC": Zygomatico-Maxillary-Complex fracture to the left of the face.  The fracture was wired at lateral and lower orbit.  There had been an infection to the bone during healing of the bone.
fingerprints: Fingerprint information is currently not available
dental: Dental information / charting is available and entered
documents: There are currently no documents available for this case.
